channel.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - The Ghost of Mistmoor
channel.description:
The newest episode of Fear of a Black Dragon is now available! in this one, Tom and I are talking about the classic Ghost of Mistmoor from Dungeon Magazine #35, published back in 1992. In the Expert Delve, we talk about ghost stories in TTRPGs. You can listen here:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/the-ghost-of-mistmoor

item.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - The Ghost of Mistmoor

item.description:
@jasoncordova wrote:

The newest episode of Fear of a Black Dragon is now available! in this one, Tom and I are talking about the classic Ghost of Mistmoor from Dungeon Magazine #35, published back in 1992. In the Expert Delve, we talk about ghost stories in TTRPGs. You can listen here:

THE GAUNTLET

The Ghost of Mistmoor

Fear of a Black Dragon is hosted by Tom McGrenery and Jason Cordova, with production by Rich Rogers.
